original_title: Bobby Bumps on the Doughnut Trail
overview: A black maid is sitting in the kitchen doing some chore or another (difficult to see what.) Bobby Bumps has hidden inside a box and is trying to get something from the larder without the maid seeing him. But she spots him and lashes him with a whip. He runs off and the maid laughs....
title: Bobby Bumps on the Doughnut Trail
